FdoIDestroySpatialContext
Execute
FdoIConnection
GetName
SetName

virtual FDO_API void FdoIDestroySpatialContext::Execute (   )  [pure virtual]
 

Executes the DestroySpatialContext command, removing all data stored in that context. An exception is thrown if the spatial context does not exist.

Returns:
Returns nothing
